    • Method Detail

      • send

        public void send(SRecMessageRequest request)
        Overrides interface's send method. This create a new thread to handle he request and send it. Firstly, a SRecMessageRequest message is sent to server. Secondly, server send a SRecMessageResponse message. and update allWasGood variable.
        Specified by:
        send in interface Client
        Parameters:
        request - the SRecMessageRequest message sent to server
        See Also:
        SRecMessageRequest, SRecMessageResponse

      • getLastResponseResult

        public boolean getLastResponseResult()
        Overrides interface's getLastResponseResult method. If last request was good return true, else false.
        Specified by:
        getLastResponseResult in interface Client
        Returns:
        allWasGood.

      • logConsole

        private void logConsole(SRecMessage message)
        Print in console relevant information. Just for debug.
        Parameters:
        message - the message
